name: LOSTISLAND
description:
you do not know where you are and you must get out of the maze and go to the house and face the creepy monester and solve puzzels A simple and short horror/ thriller game 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

controls

[ESC]  = Pause game

[Left Mouse] = Interact

[WASD] = Movement

[F] = flashlight

[tab] = open inventory
